text:
<https://www.uncorkedstudios.com/blog/the-adidas-all-day-app-in-beta/|The adidas All Day App in Beta>
Here at Uncorked, we get to work on a wide range of projects, and today we’re excited to say that one of those is the
<http://www.adidas.com/us/allday|All Day well-being app> from adidas.

And we use the word “well-being” very intentionally, because All Day is carving out new territory in this space. In a world that is saturated with fitness trackers and calorie counters, there is room to better address health and wellness in a way that aligns with how people actually think...

attachments.title: The adidas All Day App in Beta
attachments.text: Here at Uncorked, we get to work on a wide range of projects, and today we’re excited to say that one of those is the All Day well-being app from adidas. And we use the word “well-being” very intentionally, because All Day is carving out new territory in this space. In a world that is saturated with fitness trackers and calorie counters, there is room to better address health and wellness in a way that aligns with how people actually think about their well-being.
attachments.fallback: The adidas All Day App in Beta

attachments.title: All Day Fitness App | adidas US
attachments.text: Create all round well being with the All Day free fitness app from adidas. Discover workout tips, nutrition goals and challenges for mind, body and soul.
attachments.fallback: adidas United States: All Day Fitness App | adidas US
